articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Southernmost Islet Detachment in Western Sector of Front
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Southernmost Islet Detachment in Western Sector of Front
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), inspected the outpost on Kali Islet and the defence detachment on Jangjae Islet in the West Sea on the southernmost tip of the western sector of the front.
					 He first visited the outpost on Kali Islet in the West Sea on the   southernmost tip of the western sector of the front by sailing up there despite high waves from where the base of the south Korean puppet forces on Yongphyong Island was in sight. 
					
					 The outpost newly set up thanks to his far-sighted wisdom and operational plan has turned into a powerful firepower strike base. It is capable of frustrating frequent risky military provocations of the enemy in the waters of the West Sea, firmly defending the inviolable territorial waters of the country and opening fire to wipe out the enemy the moment they perpetrate even a slight reckless provocation.
					
					 After going round barracks, education room, mess hall and greenhouse, he gave important instructions to improve the standard of the living of the soldiers on the islet and took benevolent steps for doing so.
					
					 At an observation post he learned in detail about the deployment of forces and equipment at the outpost on Kali Islet and the performance of the naval guard duty of the units under the 4th Corps on the front.
					
					 He approved the newly worked out combat document of the plan for firepower strike at Yonphyong Island.
					
					 Going round combat positions, he indicated important tasks for rounding off combat preparations and increasing combat capability of the outpost.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the commanding officers and soldiers of the outpost would devotedly defend their post in the West Sea on the southernmost tip of the southwestern sector of the front of the socialist country.
					
					 He visited the defence detachment on Jangjae Islet on his return trip.
					
					 He went round the barracks, education room, wash-cum-bath room, mess hall, greenhouse and animal sheds of the defence detachment.
					
					 Acquainting himself in detail with the supply service to the soldiers, he showed profound loving care to be conveyed to posterity.
					
					 The confrontation with the enemy is the one of fire and, at the same time, a stand-off in idea and faith, he said, adding that the soldiers of the defence detachment should be provided with lots of ideological pabulum, if they are prepared to be the strongest in mental power who do not abandon their revolutionary faith even though they may die, defenders of socialism standing guard over the first line of the class struggle and the stalwart fighters for national reunification, 
					
					 He underlined the need to train the soldiers to be fighters with versatile knowledge and cultural entertainments.
					
					 He was very satisfied with Jangjae Islet clad in thick verdure.
					
					 At the observation post he heard a detailed report on the enemy situation and a report on the performance of the combat duty by the defence detachment.
					
					 He learned about the current combat preparations of weapons and combat and technical equipment, going round the firepower positions.
					
					 Noting that the defence detachment has a very important duty to perform, he gave precious instructions for rounding off its combat preparations.
					
					 He gave them a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts before having a photo session with all soldiers and officers and their families.
					
					 Accompanying him were Vice-Marshal of the KPA Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Army Col. General Ri Yong Gil, first vice-chief of the KPA General Staff and director of the General Operation Bureau, Army Major General Pak Jong Chon, director of the Artillery Bureau of the KPA, Army Lieut. General Ri Song Guk, commander of the 4th Corps of the KPA, and Army Major General Ri Yong Chol, political commissar of the corps.

articles.title: Vice-Chairmen of C.C., WPK Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in Sixth Congress of DWUK
articles.content:
Vice-Chairmen of C.C., WPK Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in Sixth Congress of DWUK
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Vice-Chairmen of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Sunday visited the lodging quarters of the participants in the Sixth Congress of the  Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK).
					 Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and officials of the WPK Central Committee and the DWUK Central Committee met with the participants in the congress.
					
					 They congratulated the officials and members of the women's union participating in the congress.
					
					 They encouraged the participants in the congress, while hearing the stories about how they have led a worthwhile life and performed feats in the drive for strengthening the women's union and achieving the prosperity of the country.
					
					 They requested the participants to discharge the duty of the Korean women in the struggle to glorify forever the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the Juche-oriented women's movement and implement the tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan headed by Vice-Chairperson of its Central Standing Committee Nam Ju Hyon and a delegation of women officials of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Ri Sun Nam, chairperson of the Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China, that are here to participate in the 6th Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 The members of the delegations paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the hall where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls in which the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: DPRK Qualified to Participate in EAFF E-1 Football Championship 2017
articles.content:
DPRK Qualified to Participate in EAFF E-1 Football Championship 2017
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK men's football team won the qualification for the EAFF E-1 Football Championship 2017. 
					 Nov. 6 to 12 preliminary league match round 2 that was held in Hong Kong, China brought together the teams of the DPRK, Hong Kong of China, Taipei of China and Guam.
					
					 The DPRK team beat its Taipei, China rival 2:0, on Nov. 6, its Guam rival 2:0 on Nov. 9 and its Hong Kong, China rival 1:0 on Nov. 12.
					
					 As a result, the DPRK team took the first place and was qualified to participate in the EAFF E-1 Football Championship due in Japan in Dec. 2017.

articles.title: Medical Apparatuses of Value Developed
articles.content:
Medical Apparatuses of Value Developed
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Medical Appliances Technical Company in the DPRK has developed various kinds of medical apparatuses conducive to the improvement of people's health.
					 The new instruments include a portable health-screening tool, an ultrasonic diagnosing appliance for abdomen, a bio-quantum resonance analyzer and a digital echoencephalograph.
					
					 The portable health-screening tool can measure blood pressure, electrocardiogram, pulsation and body temperature in one minute, with the help of mobile communication network.
					
					 According to their developers, the effectiveness of those instruments was proven through clinical laboratory.
					
					 The new medical appliances won a high appreciation at the intellectual product exhibitions in July and August and at the 7th National Medical Apparatuses Exhibition.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Literature and Art Field of DPRK
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Literature and Art Field of DPRK
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Signal achievements have been made in the field of literature and art of the DPRK.
					 Creators and artists in the cinematic art sector produced feature films "Story about My House", "Trace of Military Service" and "Graduation Diploma" and serials of cartoon "The Boy General".
					
					 Those in the documentary and science film sectors produced scores of films.
					
					 Also, a number of masterpieces were produced in the theatrical art sector. They include revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight", drama "Blood Vessel", music, dance and poem "Story Conveyed by 'Arirang'", dance suite "Our Golden Country", music and dance story "Life Story of Youth" and circus performance "Glory to the Great Party".
					
					 Meanwhile, lyric poem "200-day Campaign" and many other literary works were created to encourage the people in the efforts for building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Farce aimed at Tiding over Ruling Crisis
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Farce Aimed at Tiding over Ruling Crisis
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary condemns Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, for crying out for "counteraction to the north's nukes," "sanctions on the north," and south Korea-U.S. "cooperation" when meeting with the U.S. ambassadors to south Korea, China and Japan in Seoul recently.
					 Yun's behavior reminds one of a dog prowling here and there for its prey now that south Korea has turned into a mourner's house because of the worst scandal of the monopolization of the administration committed by traitor Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Lurking behind this is a cynical ploy to gloss over the international public criticism of the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal" and weather the ruling crisis even a bit.
					
					 Such farce of Yun is also aimed to create again the climate of ratcheting up sanctions and pressure on the DPRK by clinging to the sleeves of his American master.
					
					 Yun's remarks are nothing but the last-ditch efforts to maintain the bankrupt system of cooperation in putting pressure on the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 Only miserable ruin awaits pro-U.S. sycophant and traitor and confrontation maniac Yun, identical to Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: Anti-Park Geun Hye Action Launched by People in Kwangju, North and South Jolla Provinces
articles.content:
Anti-Park Geun Hye Action Launched by People in Kwangju, North and South Jolla Provinces
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The Kwangju and South Jolla Provincial Consultative Council of the General Students Councils issued a declaration on the situation at Kwangju University on Nov. 11, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 The declaration said the prosecution should make an unlimited investigation and sternly punish Choe Sun Sil who controlled the "president" and the room of secretaries and major figures of Chongwadae that connived at it.
					
					 It called upon the people to turn out in the action for ousting Park Geun Hye in order to retake democracy.
					
					 On the same day, the Kunsan Youth and Students Federation issued a declaration on the situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionists Stage Action for Ouster of Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionists Stage Action for Ouster of Park Geun Hye Regime
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Parish of the Catholic Church of south Korea held a mass on the situation on Nov. 11 to force the Park Geun Hye regime to step down, the south Korean online paper Tongil News said.
					 Speakers called for devoting themselves to democratization and justice of society and forcing Park, the chief culprit of the monopolization of administration, to step down at an early date.
					
					 A declaration on the situation was read out at the mass.
					
					 It called upon all religionists to join the people in the action for forcing Park to resign with firm will.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Accused of Not Resigning
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Accused of Not Resigning
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS on Nov. 11 aired that Park Geun Hye is not quitting office though she is impeached and rejected by the people.
					 The radio demanded Park listen to the people's shouts and take an option demanded by them.

articles.title: 5,000 People in Taegu, S. Korea Demand Resignation of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
5,000 People in Taegu, S. Korea Demand Resignation of Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- There took place the second Taegu rally on the situation on Nov. 11, according to reports.
					 Present there were citizens and secondary and high school students, more than 5,000 in all.
					
					 The participants expressed grievance over traitor Park Geun Hye mocking the people under the thumb of a shaman.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants marched to Tongsong-ro, shouting "Park Geun Hye, resign" and "Saenuri Party, dissolve itself".
					
					 Meanwhile, school youth and students in Taegu issued a declaration on the situation demanding the ouster of Park on that evening.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Demand Park Geun Hye Transfer Power
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Demand Park Geun Hye Transfer Power
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean opposition parties demanded Park Geun Hye transfer all power as wished by the people on Nov. 12, the south Korean MBC reported.
					 A senior spokesman for the Minju Party said that in order to bring administration to normal, the "president" should abandon a lingering attachment and opt for transfer of all power.
					
					 A senior spokesman for the Kukmin Party noted that Park should quit office of her own accord politically and legally in response to the people's demand.
					
					 The Minju Party said that it would pool its will to set right the foundation of society which collapsed due to the unheard-of scandal of monopolization of administration, and the Jongui Party noted now the people want the next-term "president" to be elected on the premise of the ouster of the "president".
					
					 The Kukmin Party demanded the "president" apologize before the people immediately and accept the demand of the people for resignation.

articles.title: S. Korean Lawyers Issue Declaration on Situation
articles.content:
S. Korean Lawyers Issue Declaration on Situation
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Lawyers under the 14 local bar associations in different parts of south Korea turned out in the action to urge Park Geun Hye to step down from office on Nov. 11, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					They held a press conference outside the Lawyers House in Seoul on the same day and issued a declaration on the situation signed by more than 3,200 lawyers.
					
					 The declaration said that a tiny handful of forces privatized the power and used it as a means of accumulation.
					
					 The disclosed "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal" is no more than a tip of iceberg, it said, adding that thorough probe into the truth should be made and those involved in the scandal should be punished.

articles.title: Sector Rallies Held in Seoul Prior to People's All-out Action
articles.content:
Sector Rallies Held in Seoul Prior to People's All-out Action
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Many crowds who gathered in Seoul from across south Korea to participate in the people's all-out action  in protest against the Park Geun Hye regime held rallies of sectors in different parts of Seoul before the main rally.
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions held a workers rally at Seoul Square.
					
					 At the rally it warned that if Park does not quit office, it would protest against her through a general strike.
					
					 There took place rallies around Namdaemun and at the entrance of Uljiro and before Posin Pavilion and the Sejong Cultural House.
					
					 There were also actions of university students and school youth and children and the Christian Movement Headquarters.
					
					 At the end of the sector rallies hundreds of thousands of people gathered in Seoul.

articles.title: Third All-People Action Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Third All-People Action Launched in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The third all-people action was launched on a large scale across south Korea on Nov. 12 to oust traitor Park Geun Hye from office.
					 Nearly 1.1 million people from all walks of life turned out in the action to demonstrate their will to bring Park Geun Hye to justice of history.
					
					 After holding sector rallies in different parts of Seoul, the participants gathered at Seoul Square and held the 2016 people's all-out rally.
					
					 Nearly one million people of all social standings including lawmakers from the opposition parties and some lawmakers from the ruling party made the square a sea of candlelight with resentment and hatred for Park.
					
					 Speeches were made at the rally.
					
					 The participants made public a declaration.
					
					 It said that the essence of the "Park Geun Hye scandal" is a crystal of corruption and incompetence and the people's resentment is an expression of the will not to remain a passive onlooker to the abnormal society any longer.
					
					 Then the participants, divided into five directions, started a citizens grand march along major roads to encircle Chongwadae with slogan board reading "President Park Geun Hye, resign" in their hands. 
					
					 Attending the candlelight action were lawmakers not belonging to pro-Park circle of the "Saenuri Party".
					
					 Enraged at the police's whisking off demonstrators, the participants waged a fierce fight with the police.
					
					 There took place a strike outside Chongwadae. Then the participants held a candlelight rally again.
					
					 They staged over-night strike.
					
					 Actions of the people for punishing Park were held across south Korea simultaneously.

articles.title: Campaign of Making Public Declaration on Situation Launched Abroad
articles.content:
Campaign of Making Public Declaration on Situation Launched Abroad
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Overseas Korean pastors on Nov. 11 issued a joint declaration on the situation urging Park Geun Hye regime to step down from office, according to a south Korean internet paper.
					 The people felt a sense of shame at the fact that all state affairs of the Park regime were administered by non-expert Choe Sun Sil, deplored the declaration.
					
					 On the same day, Koreans in the U.S. and Canada issued a statement on the situation.
					
					 In case Park Geun Hye fails to step down and the "Saenuri Party" is not dissolved, Park and her confidants should be held accountable for ensuing tragedy.
					
					 On that evening, there took place protest actions including candlelight rally and declaration on the situation of Koreans in Washington, New York and other places of the U.S. demanding the ouster and arrest of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Koreans in Japan also issued a declaration on the emergency situation demanding Park's resignation.

articles.title: Joint Seminar on Juche Idea and Songun Politics Takes Place in Nepal
articles.content:
Joint Seminar on Juche Idea and Songun Politics Takes Place in Nepal
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar on the Juche idea and Songun politics took place in Nepal on Nov. 4.
					 Displayed at the venue of the seminar were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing the advantages of the socialist system of the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were figures of the political parties, organizations and media such as the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist), Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal and the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics and the DPRK ambassador to Nepal and members of his embassy.
					
					 The chairman of the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 A reporter and speakers said that the foundation of the Juche idea and enforcement of the Songun politics are the greatest exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the Korean people and the world progressive people, adding Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, formulated the Juche idea as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 They stressed that Korean socialism based on the Juche idea and guaranteed by Songun politics is greatly encouraging the world progressive people's struggle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Hungary
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Hungary
Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Budapest on Nov. 8.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and hold significant political and cultural events including a lecture and film show on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona puestos de defensa en el frente suroeste
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona puestos de defensa en el frente suroeste
Pyongyang, 13 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la base avanzada de la isla Gali y la unidad de defensa de la isla Jangjae, situadas en el extremo sur de la zona maritima del frente suroeste.
					El Comandante Supremo inspecciono primero la base avanzada de la isla Gali donde se ve muy de cerca la isla Yonphyong en que estan estacionados los gangsteres del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Esta base, organizada nuevamente segun la medida de larga prevision y el proyecto operacional de el, es la de fuerte golpe artillero con la mision de aplastar los peligrosos movimientos militares de los enemigos que se observan a cualquier hora en el Mar Oeste, defender firmemente el sagrado mar territorial de la patria y abrir inmediatamente el fuego de artilleria si aquellos cometen el menor acto malo.
					
					Luego de recorrer el cuartel, la sala de educacion, el comedor y los invernaderos, dio valiosas instrucciones para mejorar las condiciones de vida de los militares del puesto insular y tomo medidas beneficiosas para ellos.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia se cercioro de la composicion de efectivos y la distribucion de equipos militares de la base avanzada y del estado de guardia de zonas maritimas del frente por las unidades adscritas al 4o cuerpo de ejercito.
					
					Dio aprobacion al nuevo plan de fuego artillero contra la isla Yonphyong.
					
					Recorrio las trincheras de combate y presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en los preparativos de combate y el incremento de la combatividad de la base.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los comandantes y militares de la base avanzada de la isla Gali defenderan a costa de la vida su puesto en el extremo sur de la patria socialista.
					
					En el trayecto de regreso, volvio a visitar la unidad de defensa de la isla Jangjae.
					
					Paso revista al cuartel, la sala de educacion, el bano, el comedor, el invernadero y los corrales.
					
					Informado en detalles del estado de intendencia para los militares, les dispenso grandes benevolencias.
					
					El enfrentamiento con los enemigos es el de fuegos y, al mismo tiempo, el de idea y conviccion, dijo y continuo que hay que dar mucha educacion ideologica a los militares de la unidad para prepararlos como los fuertes en lo espiritual que no renuncian el credo en la revolucion aunque mueran, los defensores del socialismo en la primera linea de lucha clasista y los combatientes valientes para la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Instruyo formar a los militares como personal que posea conocimientos multilaterales y vocaciones culturales.
					
					Se mostro muy contento de que la isla Jangjae haya sido bien reforestada.
					
					Recibio en el puesto de vigilancia el parte detallado sobre la situacion de tropas enemigas y el estado de cumplimiento de la mision de la unidad y recorrio las posiciones de fuego averiguando la rutinaria disposicion de combate de las armas y equipos tecnicos.
					
					Es muy importante la mision de esta unidad, apunto y dio instrucciones valiosas para completar los preparativos de combate en la unidad.
					
					Kim Jong Un dio como recuerdo a la unidad los binoculos y el fusil automatico y se fotografio con todos los militares y sus familiares en la isla.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil, primer subjefe y director general de Operaciones del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el general de brigada de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Jong Chon, director de Artilleria del EPC, el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Song Guk, jefe del 4o cuerpo de ejercito del EPC, y el general de brigada de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Chol, comisario politico del mismo cuerpo.
